user_query: My company needs to analyze the 24-hour trading data of different markets. Fetch the tickers from the QuantaEx Market Data API and then use the data to generate time series charts for specific stocks using the Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading API. Additionally, retrieve the key statistics related to operating efficiency for a particular stock from the Morning Star API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the tickers from the QuantaEx Market Data API.
Generate time series charts for specific stocks using the Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading API with the tickers obtained from Step 1.
Retrieve key statistics related to operating efficiency for a particular stock from the Morning Star API.
